name: milligram-less
description: A minimalist CSS framework on Less version.
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -rf src/* dist
scripts.less: lessc src/milligram.less test/milligram.css && lessc --compress src/milligram.less test/milligram.min.css
scripts.build: run-s lint less autoprefixer copy banner
